recipesJson.name: Custardy Sweet Leaf
recipesJson.author: OldMan
recipesJson.description:
Really just took Verve's Sweet Leaf , split the vanilla's between Shisha Vanilla and Cap French Vanilla v2 , then threw some INW Custard at it. 
I added .5% Super Sweet because I like it on the sweet side but this would work fine without it. 

It's ok as a SNV but after 5 days it's "there".
